channel.title: Help with making a server message
channel.description: hey guys can you'll just tell me where i can find where to put a server message in? tysm peeps bye.

item.title: Help with making a server message
item.dc:creator: @geeno geeno
item.description:
@geeno wrote:

here is mine…

	sendMessage("Welcome to Pi Scape !");
	sendMessage("Created by Pi.");
	sendMessage("Type ::help to view information about leveling,obtaining items and Pking (drops!).");
	sendMessage("Latest update: More magic spells!! type ::switch for normal spells.");
	for (int a = 0; a < lastMessage.length; a++) {
		lastMessage[a] = "";
	}
	if (premium) {
		sendMessage("Your account has premium member status");
	} else {
		sendMessage("You are not a premium member.  To subscribe click 'Become premium' on PiScapeServer.Tk");
	}
	if (playerMessages > 0)
		sendMessage("You have "
				+ playerMessages
				+ " new messages.  Check your inbox at PiScapeServer.tk to view them.");

just go to this easy 0/10…

  1. client.java
  2. ctrl + f and search soemthing like lets say u have devolyuion 7.0 source search devolution
  3. Replace it with your server name
  4. compile run server login BINGO!
    Hope i helped!

+Rep+
if i helped

Read full topic
item.source: Help with making a server message
